data.title: Kansas State University
data.meta_description: Trae Davis (15) Wide Receiver - AT TROUP HIGH SCHOOL: Played for the Tigers under head coach Sam Wells... Regarded as the 224th-best overall prospect in the ...
data.text:
AT TROUP HIGH SCHOOL: Played for the Tigers under head coach Sam Wells... Regarded as the 224th-best overall prospect in the nation for the Class of 2024 by On3, while the service also views him as the 36th-best player in the state of Texas and the 37th-best wide receiver in the nation... Picked up all-state honors following his senior campaign as both a wide receiver and a returner... Earned district MVP honors as a senior, while he was a first team all-district pick as both a junior and senior... Set 12 school records, including the game, season and career marks in both catches and receiving touchdowns... Hauled in 120 catches for 2,254 yards and 31 touchdowns over his prep career, while he also rushed for 1,272 yards and 14 touchdowns... Also competed in basketball – earning district newcomer of the year honors as a freshman and all-district honors as a sophomore – as he scored 1,000 career points, while he also competed in track and field.

PERSONAL: Charles Davis III was born December 12, 2005... Son of Charles and Shevieka Davis... Has one sibling, Tayla... Plans on majoring in kinesiology.
